+++ b/home/fernanda/mnt/fernanda/git-styler/styler/python/experiments/results/bakdata-conquery/styler/623/JsonValidationExceptionMapper.java
@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@ public class JsonValidationExceptionMapper implements ExceptionMapper<Constraint
 			requestContext.get().getMethod(),
 			requestContext.get().getRequestUri(),
 			Joiner.on('\n').join(Iterables.transform(exception.getConstraintViolations(), this::constraintMessageBuilder))

 		return Response.status(422)
 						.type(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE)
